channel.title: RuneVeteran 737 Striving For Perfection
channel.description:
[CENTER]Welcome to the website of RuneVeteran
Download link : [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?10ln3j1a54og4yt]RuneVeteran.jar[/url]
[SIZE=3]Team : Keyal Joel Ali There are currently two developers spots open.[/SIZE] [SIZE=5]WE ARE STILL IN ALPHA![/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][B]What is RuneVeteran?[/B] [/SIZE]
RuneVeteran is a private server that is growing and growing!
RuneVeteran is a constantly growing server that strives for perfection in the developement stage! Once you're with RuneVeteran you won't ever want to log out![/CENTER]
RuneVeteran provides multiple difficult bosses, and perfect content. For example, we have Godwars which is fully complete. We have got fully Nex and loads of other bosses such as Queen black dragon and King Black Dragon. We also have working Barrows , Flasks working , Pets fully working Torva/Virtus/Pernix Working Hp health. We got overloads and all the chaotics. Fully Summonning is added. Primal plus all the other dungeoneering items. RuneVeteran is the best private server to help you enjoy the features of RuneScape, but faster! 737 cache so upgraded armour u can change back to the old features if you like so. Working Squeel of Fortune. We've recently added aura's aswell. So are Dice bag and Flower game.
[img]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/7131/kbd.png[/img] [img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/8946/fightjv.png[/img] [img]http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/4820/nexn.png[/img] [img]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/70/polypore.png[/img] [img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/7388/tormentedz.png[/img] [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/8756/sofv.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/6803/44915767.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/8823264022edd8fb56dc665ccb710939[/img] [img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/9605/lolnck.png[/img] [img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/9008/naamloosis.png[/img]
[CENTER]Features
-24/7 up Active players -We have daily updates -Reliable Offshore Dedicated Server -PKing, Skilling, Dicing, Flower game, and Many mini-games & Bosses -All working Prayers including Retribution & Redemption All Curse Prayers fully functional Perfect combat - Lag free, perfect delays, perfect switching & bridding ! Duel Arena 100% Summoning! Your familiar helps you fight in Multi-Zones God wars dungeon nearly perfected![/CENTER]
[CENTER]Features
-Squeal Of Fortune -Mage bank active -Economy -Edge active PK -There is no such thing as lagg -Server Wide Events -Perfect Switches -Correct Combat Formulas All 718 Items All 718 Npc's -Correct spots for ALL Weapons -New Jad Torva, Virtus, Pernix & their Hp Effect! -All Chaotics -Turmoil/Curses -Working Godswords. -Working mute. -working IPban. - Working Dragon claws 667+ Items Added including Npc's -Working Spirit shield effects. -Corporal Beast -Working Barrows. -Good dialogue. -Perfect Combat system. - Working curses. - Working Vengeance. - Working Ancients List. - Working Ignore List. - Working Friends List. - Working clan chat Including loot share. -Working Skillcape Emotes. -Working Lock Exp. -Fixed No-Clip. - Working Trade. - Working Following. - working barrage orb -All bosses -Nex -Strykwerms -Full GWD -Tormented Demons - Armadyl storm fully added - And loads more check it out.[/CENTER]

item.title: RuneVeteran 737 Striving For Perfection
item.dc:creator: @Keyal Keyal
item.description:
@Keyal wrote:

[CENTER]Welcome to the website of RuneVeteran

Download link : RuneVeteran.jar

[SIZE=3]Team :
Keyal
Joel
Ali
There are currently two developers spots open.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]WE ARE STILL IN ALPHA![/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]What is RuneVeteran?
[/SIZE]

RuneVeteran is a private server that is growing and growing!

RuneVeteran is a constantly growing server that strives for perfection in the developement stage! Once you’re with RuneVeteran you won’t ever want to log out![/CENTER]

RuneVeteran provides multiple difficult bosses, and perfect content. For example, we have Godwars which is fully complete. We have got fully Nex and loads of other bosses such as Queen black dragon and King Black Dragon. We also have working Barrows , Flasks working , Pets fully working Torva/Virtus/Pernix Working Hp health. We got overloads and all the chaotics. Fully Summonning is added. Primal plus all the other dungeoneering items. RuneVeteran is the best private server to help you enjoy the features of RuneScape, but faster! 737 cache so upgraded armour u can change back to the old features if you like so. Working Squeel of Fortune. We’ve recently added aura’s aswell. So are Dice bag and Flower game.










[CENTER]Features

-24/7 up Active players
-We have daily updates
-Reliable Offshore Dedicated Server
-PKing, Skilling, Dicing, Flower game, and Many mini-games & Bosses
-All working Prayers including Retribution & Redemption
All Curse Prayers fully functional
Perfect combat - Lag free, perfect delays, perfect switching & bridding !
Duel Arena
100% Summoning! Your familiar helps you fight in Multi-Zones
God wars dungeon nearly perfected![/CENTER]

[CENTER]Features

-Squeal Of Fortune
-Mage bank active
-Economy
-Edge active PK
-There is no such thing as lagg
-Server Wide Events
-Perfect Switches
-Correct Combat Formulas
All 718 Items
All 718 Npc’s

-New Jad
Torva, Virtus, Pernix & their Hp Effect!
-All Chaotics
-Turmoil/Curses
-Working Godswords.
-Working mute.
-working IPban.

  • Working Dragon claws
    667+ Items Added including Npc’s
